nodes.bodyText: @Sanjeevani19, thanks so much for checking this! Thanks, @briantang, too!
Are these tests supposed to be skipped?
@bsrikan, those xtests should be removed, thanks. Now those tests are failing so I need to update those tests. :-(
Do we still need setView(views[props.id]); before the if condition?
@bsrikan I don't think so we need the setView before if condition
Also what if we just call setView(views[props.id], true) instead of "if" condition?
@bsrikan The boolean parameter holds true only for explorer tile, for all other tiles we don't need the second parameter hence we need that condition
True and exactly for the same reason -- "zeroState: true", wont impact other tiles -- I thought we can achieve the behavior we want with 1 line change.
@wooldridge I see that we are no longer using onSelect function in tilesview.tsx ? do we still need that for anything ?

True and exactly for the same reason -- "zeroState: true", wont impact other tiles -- I thought we can achieve the behavior we want with 1 line change.

@bsrikan right that works.
@Sanjeevani19 I'll remove onSelect(), thanks! And I will update the setView().
